ComicInfo.Penciller: Chris Warner,Dave Gibbons,Ellen Forney,Joe Sacco,Rick Geary
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dave Gibbons pays tribute to EC with a scary Martha Washington cover, tied in with the 6-page story, "Attack of the Flesh-Eating Monsters," which he and Frank Miller provide for our entertainment pleasure!
"Black Cross," which debuted in DHP #1,returns in an 8-page story by Chris Warner.
There's a 2-page autobio strip titled "Oh, My Goodness," written by Harvey Pekar and illustrated by Joe Sacco.
Ellen Forn√©y (Tomato) reveals her real-life encounter with Tom Waits in a 4-page story called "Bourbon on the Rocks".
There's an 8-page tale titled "Bird Dog" by Ed Brubaker (Lowlife) and Pat McEown (Grendel).
Brian Sendelbach takes four pages toteach us that"Violence is Golden".
And we're treated to "The Symphony of Daily Nourishment" by Rick Geary, a 1-pager with a good beat we can all dance to!
ComicInfo.Writer: Chris Warner,Ed Brubaker,Frank Miller,Harvey Pekar,Rick Geary
